item.title: @elonmusk: "For the 1st time in the four & a half billion year history of Earth, it is possible to extend consc...
item.description: "For the 1st time in the four & a half billion year history of Earth, it is possible to extend consciousness beyond our home planet "The window might be open for a short time. I wish to make sure that we extend the light of consciousness to Mars before civilization extinguishes"

item.title: @elonmusk: Why Grok stands out from other AIs: â€¢ Maximum truth-seeking: Built to prioritize raw, unfiltered tru...
item.description: Why Grok stands out from other AIs: â€¢ Maximum truth-seeking: Built to prioritize raw, unfiltered truth over political correctness or politenessâ€”answering spicy or controversial questions others refuse. â€¢ Rebellious wit & humor: Inspired by Hitchhikerâ€™s Guide to the Galaxy, with a sarcastic, fun personality that makes chats engaging (not bland corporate responses). â€¢ Real-time knowledge: Deep integration with ğ•(Twitter) for up-to-the-minute info and trendsâ€”no outdated cutoffs like many competitors. â€¢ Less censored: More open on edgy topics, politically incorrect claims (if substantiated), and creative freedomâ€”while still having basic guardrails. â€¢ Advanced reasoning powerhouse: Excels in math, coding, science, and complex problem-solving, often outperforming rivals on benchmarks. â€¢ Built by xAI for curiosity: Aims to understand the universe, not just assistâ€”bold, rebellious, and maximally helpful without the woke filters. ğŸš€

item.title: @elonmusk: How is Tesla Diner doing five months later after opening in July? Itâ€™s 1:30pm today and itâ€™s packed ...
item.description: How is Tesla Diner doing five months later after opening in July? Itâ€™s 1:30pm today and itâ€™s packed inside. There is constant flow of floor traffic with people coming and going. People came after us had to wait for seats to be available. This is my 5th time to be here. My favorite is still Fried Chicken and Waffle Sandwich.

item.title: @elonmusk: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ TESLA'S SELF-DRIVING MODE COULD SAVE 32,000 LIVES A YEAR IN THE U.S. If everyone used Tesla's Ful...
item.description: ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ TESLA'S SELF-DRIVING MODE COULD SAVE 32,000 LIVES A YEAR IN THE U.S. If everyone used Tesla's Full Self-Driving (Supervised) mode, 32,000 lives could be saved and 1,900,000 injuries avoided every year in the U.S. In 2023, over 40,000 people died and 2.4M were injured in car crashes. Most of it was distracted driving: texting, drinking, zoning out. Tesla's FSD cuts down those crashes by over 80%, because it doesnâ€™t get drunk, tired or stare at TikTok instead of the road. Some crashes are still possible, but FSD watches everything all the time. Humans donâ€™t. Their data shows it could eliminate 30% to 44% of distracted driving crashes. If these numbers hold up, not using it sounds way more dangerous than using it. Source:@Tesla@SawyerMerritt
